https://github.com/nextcloud/activity/blob/master/docs/endpoint-v2.md#example
We are using the PreviewObject, which does not contain the remote path.
So we cannot handle click operation with only this info. (to open a file we currently need the remote path. We could of course also write a function that retrieves first the remote path for a given file from server and use this then).
As this info is already in subject_rich  list, we search for matching info. As there is no direct relation between those (not via index), we need to use fileID and compare it with id.
As there can only be one match, we can do a break, if we found this.
createThumbnailNew(…) creates then one ImageView with corresponding click listener.
For next preview object creatThumbnailNew(…) will be called again and thus do the same.
